definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
to write an IOU or promissory note

sentences.english: Then there is the American tax rebate, still sitting in many consumers' bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 美国税率折扣也还在一些消费者的银行存款挂着白条。

sentences.english: We shouldn't issue IOU to farmers.
sentences.chinese: 我们不应该给农民打白条。

sentences.english: Long white strips curl under his fingers.
sentences.chinese: 长白条餐巾纸在他的手指下缠绕着。

sentences.english: How to handle irregularities certificate such as white bars.
sentences.chinese: 会计人员收到白条等不合规定的凭证，如何处理？

sentences.english: And her Lulu Guinness clutch is, er, white on black.
sentences.chinese: 而且她的露露吉尼斯紧身衣是，呃，黑底白条的。

sentences.english: Next year we should not issue IOUs to farmers again when we purchase farm produce and sideline products from them.
sentences.chinese: 明年我们不应再给农民打白条了。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To compare and identify Zaocys dhumnades and its adulterant Elaphe dione .
sentences.chinese: 目的比较鉴别乌梢蛇与白条锦蛇。
